placeholders.name: Fire Dragon
placeholders.summary: Majestic creatures that dominate flames and inhabit active volcanoes
placeholders.cultural_note: Describe a rite, taboo or cultural curiosity of this race
placeholders.general_appearance: Red and golden scales that shine like living embers
placeholders.special_physical_characteristics: Membranous wings capable of generating thermal currents, obsidian claws
placeholders.habits: Nocturnal during winter, diurnal in summer; hibernate during low volcanic activity
placeholders.reproductive_cycle: Oviparous, lay eggs in magma chambers every 50 years
placeholders.diet: Carnivorous, prefer large prey charred by their own fire
placeholders.elemental_diet: Absorb thermal energy from lava and geothermal sources
placeholders.moral_tendency: Neutral trending chaotic; value freedom above all
placeholders.social_organization: Live solitary in volcanic territories, rarely forming alliances
placeholders.physical_capacity: Superhuman strength equivalent to 20 men; resistance to extreme temperatures
placeholders.special_characteristics: Fire breath capable of melting metals; accelerated regeneration in hot environments
placeholders.weaknesses: Vulnerable to low temperatures; lose strength in aquatic environments
placeholders.story_motivation: Ancient guardians of the secrets of primordial fire
placeholders.inspirations: Norse mythology (Fafnir), Asian dragons, mythological salamanders
